error.message: ${label} must be a decimal number, ${value} is invalid.

error.name: match.headerAbsolute
error.message: The net invoice amount is ${actualDifference} greater than the PO amount, but only ${allowedDifference} is allowed.

error.name: match.headerPercentage
error.message: The net invoice amount is ${actualPercentage} greater than the PO amount, but only ${allowedPercentage} is allowed.

error.name: match.line.total.absolute
error.message: On line ${lineNumber}, the total extended line amount is ${actualDifference} more than the PO line amount, but only ${allowedDifference} is allowed.

error.name: match.line.total.percentage
error.message: On line ${lineNumber}, the total extended line amount is ${actualPercentage} more than the PO line amount, but only ${allowedPercentage} is allowed.

error.name: match.line.unitprice.absolute
error.message: On line ${lineNumber}, the invoice unit price varies from the PO unit price by ${actualDifference} which is more than the allowed tolerance of ${allowedDifference}.

error.name: match.line.unitprice.percentage
error.message: On line ${lineNumber}, the invoice unit price varies from the PO unit price by ${actualPercentage} which is more than the ${allowedPercentage} tolerance allowed.

error.name: match.multiplePos

error.name: match.noLines
